title: Textile, Early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery on satin weave
description: A, B) Irregularly-shaped fragments cut from a cope. Cream-colored satin embroidered in flowing pattern of scallop shell, scrolls, flowers and fruit in multi-colored silks. C) One panel made fom two cope fragments. Embroidered in pattern of scrolls, flowers, fruits and geometric ribbon in multi-colored silks. Worked in satin, long and short and stem stitch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, Early 18th century.Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery on satin weave. 1969-38-2-a/c.
